p: Attending to the number of compounds identified, sesquiterpene hydrocarbons are the most diverse group in most of the species. Monoterpene hydrocarbons and oxygenated monoterpene alcohols also tend to be among the most copious groups ( Figure 1). Nevertheless, in some species such as C. reticulata or C. limon, the most numerous group corresponds to non-terpenoid aldehydes ( Figure 2).
